donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Output 1.1 : Governance processes made more sensitive to culturally based development strategies. Output 2.2 : Capacity built and examples piloted with participatory approach. Output 2.3: Cuture Based Local Development and livelihood creation

project_descr: The JP has two outcomes: (i) support China in designing and implementing policies to promote rights of ethnic minorities, and (ii) empower ethnic minorities to better manage cultural resources and benefit from culture-based economic development.
project_title: UN Joint prorgamme on the China Culture and Development
